taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus anaplobatus;species odoratus;variety columbianus;

treatment.other_name: (in acknowledgment of comparisons made in the herbarium of columbia college)
treatment.description: Lobes of leaf lanceolate, incised and sharply double-serrate; flowers 2-3 cm. broad. (Rubacer columbianum Rydb,)
